Detailed Description

Mercury API - Tag Operations Interface.

Author:
Nathan Williams
Date:
1/8/2010

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum TMR_TagopType

The type of a tag operation structure

Enumerator:
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_READDATA  Gen2 memory read
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_WRITEDATA  Gen2 memory write
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_LOCK  Gen2 memory lock/unlock
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_KILL  Gen2 tag kill
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_BLOCKWRITE  Gen2 tag block write
TMR_TAGOP_GEN2_BLOCKPERMALOCK  Gen2 tag block permalock
TMR_TAGOP_ISO180006B_READDATA  ISO180006B memory read
TMR_TAGOP_ISO180006B_WRITEDATA  ISO180006B memory write
TMR_TAGOP_ISO180006B_LOCK  ISO180006B memory lock/unlock
TMR_TAGOP_LIST  ISO180006B tag kill List of tag operations
